name: io.github.m2ai-mcp-servers/videogen-mcp
description: Unified MCP server for video generation with intelligent routing to HeyGen (avatar/presenter videos) or Google Veo (creative/cinematic content).

required.name: HEYGEN_API_KEY
required.description: HeyGen API key from Space Settings > API

required.name: GEMINI_API_KEY
required.description: Google AI Studio API key with Veo access

tools.name: generate_video
tools.description: Generate video with intelligent routing to HeyGen or Veo

tools.name: get_video_status
tools.description: Check job status (works for both services)

tools.name: download_video
tools.description: Get download URL for completed video

tools.name: list_voices
tools.description: List available HeyGen voices for avatar videos

tools.name: create_avatar_video
tools.description: Create HeyGen video with specific avatar/voice

tools.name: get_template_details
tools.description: Get HeyGen template variables and details

tools.name: generate_creative_video
tools.description: Generate cinematic video with full Veo controls

tools.name: generate_video_from_image
tools.description: Animate a static image into video using Veo
